definition: to draw a prize/a lottery/a raffle
to draw out/to pull out from in between/to remove part of the whole/(of certain plants) to sprout or bud/to whip or thrash

sentences.english: Everyone present at the party will have a chance to enter our lucky lottery.
sentences.chinese: 每個出席這次晚會人都將有機會參加我們的幸運抽獎。

sentences.english: Dine-in fathers can take part in Father's Day lucky draw.
sentences.chinese: 用餐父親可參加父親節幸運抽獎。

sentences.english: Dr. Xiaojing Ma of Cornell University Medical College announces the winners of the lucky draw.
sentences.chinese: 康奈爾大學醫學院馬小京教授爲幸運觀衆抽獎。

sentences.english: First prize in the raffle is a holiday for two in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 抽獎銷售的頭獎是兩個人到巴黎度假旅遊。

sentences.english: This lucky draw came first in the 2nd Category of the Sweepstake .
sentences.chinese: 這次幸運抽中的是二類馬票的第一次抽獎。

sentences.english: He said the results from a new drawing will be announced July 15th.
sentences.chinese: 他表示新一輪的抽獎結果將於7月15日公佈。

sentences.english: We're just going to raffle them off by selecting a few people at random.
sentences.chinese: 我們只是要在隨機抽獎中選擇少數人趕走。

sentences.english: Q. Can I just select the NF Prem option for the Gold and Silver prizes and avoid the drawing?
sentences.chinese: 我可以選擇跟金銀獎等值的遊戲中物品而避免抽獎嗎？

sentences.english: Customers who successfully registered are eligible to participate in the Lucky Draw.
sentences.chinese: 成功登記之客戶方合資格參與此抽獎。

sentences.english: Drawing were sold in New Jersey and Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 兩張百萬抽獎券於新澤西和喬治亞州被售出。

sentences.english: Fans were lined outside the store! But there were many raffle prizes for everyone waiting.
sentences.chinese: 而舉辦方爲等待的粉絲們也準備了豐富的抽獎獎品。

sentences.english: They tried to hype up their goods by the lottery.
sentences.chinese: 他們試圖以抽獎的方式刺激銷售。

sentences.english: Each balloon has a ticket attached that entitles the holder to enter a prize draw .
sentences.chinese: 每個氣球都連有一張票，得票者可參加抽獎。

sentences.english: About eleven, Well get "Mild-Seven"draw, Please dont go away Rug draw Great draw. Big draw.
sentences.chinese: 大約十一點，我們會有七星之夜大抽獎，請不要走開。

sentences.english: Two winning tickets for Mega Millions Lottery Drawing were sold in New Jersey and Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 在新澤西州和喬治亞州，兩張百萬抽獎券已經售出。

definition: to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
to depart as quick as a flash/flash mob
meeting place/place where people gather/CL:個|个[ge4]
(zoology) segment (of the body of a worm, centipede etc)/(fig.) a part of an integrated whole: aspect (of a project), element (of a policy), sector (of the economy), stage (of a process), etc
